name: TaskPerks
description: A task management and reward system for workers and buyers.
challenges: Integrating Stripe payments and optimizing database queries.
futurePlans: Adding AI-powered task recommendations and improved analytics.

name: ServeWish
description: A platform that connects volunteers with community service opportunities.
challenges: Real-time updates for volunteer events and managing authentication.
futurePlans: Enhancing event tracking, adding AI-driven volunteer matching.

name: EcoVenture
description: An eco-friendly travel planner promoting sustainable tourism.
challenges: Integrating real-time location data and optimizing travel suggestions.
futurePlans: Implementing carbon footprint tracking and AI-based eco-tourism guides.
